level.heading: REPRODUCTION AND AUTHENTICATION OF RECORDS IN THE ARCHIVES (ยง 1-1523)

level.text: The Archivist shall establish procedures for the reproduction of records in the Archives.
The Archivist shall prohibit the copying of a record by any method that might result in damage to the document.
The Administrator may charge a fee for the copying of records by Archives personnel or with Archives equipment.
The Administrator shall publish a fee schedule for the copying of records in the Archives.
The Archivist may authenticate and attest copies of records in the Archives, which shall have the same evidentiary value as those authenticated by the Administrator.
